verses.verse: To Boast <S%G2744><s%> Indeed <S%G1211><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Is Not Profitable <S%G4851><s%> To Me; <S%G3427><s%> <S%G2064><s%> For I Will Come <S%G1063><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Visions <S%G3701><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Revelations <S%G602><s%> Of The Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

I Know <S%G1492><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> <S%G4253><s%> Years Ago <S%G2094><s%> Fourteen, <S%G1180><s%> Whether <S%G1535><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Body <S%G4983><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Know Not, <S%G1492><s%> Or <S%G1535><s%> Out Of <S%G1622><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Body <S%G4983><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Know Not, <S%G1492><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Knows, <S%G1492><s%> Caught Away <S%G726><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Such A One <S%G5108><s%> To The <S%G2193><s%> Third <S%G5154><s%> Heavens. <S%G3772><s%>

That <S%G3754><s%> He Was Caught Away <S%G726><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paradise, <S%G3857><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Heard <S%G191><s%> Unutterable <S%G731><s%> Sayings, <S%G4487><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3756><s%> It Is Not Permitted <S%G1832><s%> To Man <S%G444><s%> To Speak. <S%G2980><s%>

Concerning <S%G5228><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Such A One <S%G5108><s%> I Will Boast, <S%G2744><s%> <S%G5228><s%> But Concerning <S%G1161><s%> Myself <S%G1683><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Will Not Boast, <S%G2744><s%> <S%G1487><s%> Unless <S%G3361><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G769><s%> My Weaknesses. <S%G3450><s%>

<S%G1437><s%> For If <S%G1063><s%> I Should Desire <S%G2309><s%> To Boast, <S%G2744><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Shall Not Be <S%G2071><s%> A Fool; <S%G878><s%> <S%G225><s%> For Truth <S%G1063><s%> I Will Say; <S%G2046><s%> <S%G5339><s%> But I Forbear, <S%G1161><s%> Lest <S%G3361><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> As To <S%G1519><s%> Me <S%G1691><s%> Should Reckon <S%G3049><s%> Above <S%G5228><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> He Sees <S%G991><s%> Me, <S%G3165><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Hears <S%G191><s%> Anything <S%G5100><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Me. <S%G1700><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> By The <S%G3588><s%> Surpassingness <S%G5236><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Revelations <S%G602><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> I Might Not Be Exalted, <S%G5229><s%> Was Given <S%G1325><s%> To Me <S%G3427><s%> A Thorn <S%G4647><s%> For The <S%G3588><s%> Flesh, <S%G4561><s%> A Messenger <S%G32><s%>, Of Satan, <S%G4566><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> He Might Buffet, <S%G2852><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> I Might Be Exalted. <S%G5229><s%>

For <S%G5228><s%> This <S%G5127><s%> Thrice <S%G5151><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> I Besought <S%G3870><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> It Might Depart <S%G868><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Me, <S%G1700><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Said <S%G2046><s%> To Me, <S%G3427><s%> Suffices <S%G714><s%> Thee <S%G4671><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5485><s%> My Grace; <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3588><s%> For The <S%G1063><s%> Power <S%G1411><s%> Of Me <S%G3450><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Weakness <S%G769><s%> Is Perfected. <S%G5048><s%> Most Gladly <S%G2236><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Rather <S%G3123><s%> Will I Boast <S%G2744><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G769><s%> My Weaknesses <S%G3450><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> May Dwell <S%G1981><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> Me <S%G1691><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Power <S%G1411><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> I Take Pleasure <S%G2106><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Weaknesses, <S%G769><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Insults, <S%G5196><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Necessities, <S%G318><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Persecutions, <S%G1375><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Straits, <S%G4730><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> Christ : <S%G5547><s%> <S%G3752><s%> For When <S%G1063><s%> I May Be Weak, <S%G770><s%> Then <S%G5119><s%> Powerful <S%G1415><s%> I Am. <S%G1510><s%>

I Have Become <S%G1096><s%> A Fool <S%G878><s%> Boasting; <S%G2744><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Compelled : <S%G315><s%> <S%G1473><s%> For I 1063 CONJ Ought 3784 V-IAI-1S ' By 5259 PREP You 5216 P-2GP To Have Been Commended; 4921 V-PPN 3762 A-ASN For Nothing 1063 CONJ I Was Behind 5302 V-AAI-1S Those 3588 T-GPM 5228 PREP In A Surpassing Degree 3029 ADV Apostles, 652 N-GPM If 1487 COND Also 2532 CONJ Nothing 3762 A-NSN I Am. 1510 V-PXI-1S

The <S%G3588><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> Signs <S%G4592><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Apostle <S%G652><s%> Were Worked Out <S%G2716><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Endurance, <S%G5281><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Signs <S%G4592><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Wonders <S%G5059><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Works Of Power. <S%G1411><s%>

<S%G5101><s%> For In What <S%G1063><s%> Is It <S%G2076><s%> That <S%G3739><s%> Ye Were Inferior <S%G2274><s%> Beyond <S%G5228><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Rest Of The <S%G3062><s%> Assemblies, <S%G1577><s%> <S%G1487><s%> Unless <S%G3361><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Myself <S%G846><s%> I 1473 P-1NS 3756 PRT-N Did Not Lazily Burden 2655 V-AAI-1S You? 5216 P-2GP Forgive 5483 V-ADM-2P Me 3427 P-1DS 3588 T-ASF 93 N-ASF This Injustice. 3778 D-ASF

Lo, <S%G2400><s%> A Third Time <S%G5154><s%> Ready <S%G2093><s%> I Am <S%G2192><s%> To Come <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> I Will <S%G3756><s%> Not Lazily Burden <S%G2655><s%> You; <S%G5216><s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1063><s%> For I Do Not Seek <S%G2212><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> Of You, <S%G5216><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> You; <S%G5209><s%> <S%G3756><s%> For Not <S%G1063><s%> Ought <S%G3784><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Children <S%G5043><s%> For The <S%G3588><s%> Parents <S%G1118><s%> To Treasure Up, <S%G2343><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Parents <S%G1118><s%> For The <S%G3588><s%> Children. <S%G5043><s%>

<S%G1473><s%> Now I 1161 CONJ Most Gladly 2236 ADV Will Spend 1159 V-FAI-1S And 2532 CONJ Will Be Utterly Spent 1550 V-FPI-1S For 5228 PREP 3588 T-GPF Souls 5590 N-GPF Your, 5216 P-2GP If 1487 COND Even 2532 CONJ More Abundantly 4056 ADV You 5209 P-2AP Loving, 25 V-PAP-NSM Less 2276 A-ASN I Am Loved. 25 V-PPI-1S

<S%G2077><s%> But Be It So, <S%G1161><s%> I 1473 P-1NS 3756 PRT-N Did Not Burden 2599 V-AAI-1S You; 5209 P-2AP ' But 235 CONJ Being 5225 V-PAP-NSM Crafty 3835 N-NSM With Guile 1388 N-DSM You 5209 P-2AP I Took. 2983 V-2AAI-1S
<S%G3361><s%> Any <S%G5100><s%> Of Whom <S%G3739><s%> I Have Sent <S%G649><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> ' By <S%G1223><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Did I Overreach <S%G4122><s%> You? <S%G5209><s%>

I Besought <S%G3870><s%> Titus, <S%G5103><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sent With <S%G4882><s%> Him The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Brother : <S%G5100><s%> Did Overreach <S%G4122><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Titus? <S%G5103><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> By The <S%G3588><s%> Same <S%G846><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Walked We? <S%G4043><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> In The <S%G3588><s%> Same <S%G846><s%> Steps? <S%G2487><s%>

Again <S%G3825><s%> Do Ye Think <S%G1380><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> We Are Making A Defence? <S%G626><s%> Before <S%G2714><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> We Speak; <S%G2980><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1161><s%> And All Things, <S%G3956><s%> Beloved, <S%G27><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5216><s%> Your Building Up. <S%G3619><s%>

<S%G5399><s%> For I Fear, <S%G1063><s%> Lest Perhaps <S%G3381><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Such As <S%G3634><s%> I Wish <S%G2309><s%> I Should Find <S%G2147><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> And I 2504 P-1NS-C Be Found 2147 V-APS-1S By You 5213 P-2DP Such As 3634 K-ASM 3756 PRT-N Ye Do Not Wish : 2309 V-PAI-2P Lest Perhaps There Be 3381 CONJ Strifes, 2054 N-NPF, Jealousies, 2205 N-NPM Indignations, 2372 N-NPM Contentions, 2052 N-NPF Evil Speakings, 2636 N-NPF Wisperings, 5587 N-NPM Puffings Up, 5450 N-NPF Commotions; 181 N-NPF

Lest <S%G3361><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Should Humble <S%G5013><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> As To <S%G4314><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> I Should Mourn Over <S%G3996><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Of Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Have Before Sinned, <S%G4258><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Have Not Repented <S%G3340><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Uncleanness <S%G167><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Fornication <S%G4202><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Licentiousness <S%G766><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> They Practised. <S%G4238><s%>
